title: Daily Beast: DOJ Is Taking a Fresh Look Into Hillary's Emails
meta_description: The Department of Justice has decided to review again Hillary Clinton's use of a private email server and her handling of classified information while secretary of state, the Daily Beast is reporting.
tags: Trump Administration, ISIS/Islamic State, Gun Rights, Donald Trump, Hillary Clinton, Russia

title: Schumer: Trump Will Be Blamed for Any Govt Shutdown
meta_description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., said President Donald Trump will get the blame if the government is forced to shut down because of a fight over funds for a border wall, The Hill reported.
tags: Donald Trump, Russia, Trump Administration, Gun Rights, ISIS/Islamic State
